prodNameC: 免疫特 2000 單純皰疹病毒第1型與第2型 免疫球蛋白G 試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Herpes I & II IgG Bead Pack: 200 beads, coated with HSV type I antigen (strain MacIntyre) and HSV type II antigen (G strain) (both antigens are partially purified, from infected cell lysates). 

Herpes I & II IgG Reagent Wedge: 11.5 mL buffer solution. 11.5 mL alkaline phosphatase (bovine calf intestine) conjugated to anti-human IgG antibody in buffer. 

Herpes I & II IgG Adjustor: 4 mL of human serum with IgG reactive to HSV I & II, in buffer, with preservative. 

Herpes I & II IgG Controls:
Negative Control: 2.0 mL negative control containing human serum with IgG nonreactive to HSV I and II, with preservative. 
Positive Control: 2.0 mL positive control containing human serum with IgG reactive to HSV I and II, with preservative. 

IgG/IgM Sample Diluent: 55 mL concentrated (ready-to-use) nonhuman protein/buffer matrix, with preservative.
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 利用化學冷光免疫分析法定性檢測人類血清中是否含有單純皰疹病毒(HSV) 第1型與第2型免疫球蛋白G，協助確認血清中單純皰疹病毒第1型與第2型的血清狀態。
mdFormat:
L2KHVG2 (200 tests)L2KHVG6 (600 tests)
註銷規格：L2KHVG2 (200 tests)

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
